page.title: 10LIFE ON A WIVELISCOMBE FARM
page.content:
My name is Karen, I am 11 years old, and I live on Fleed Farm, Wiveliscombe. I am going to write about how I help on the farm.
In September, October and November, when the cows calve, I help the calves to drink from a bucket. They are taken away from their mothers at one day old. In the summer, at half past four, when it is time to get the cows for milking, I go out on my bicycle. I help my dad to move the cows. In the later days of summer, I help to put bales out for the cows.
In the evening, my dad puts the milking yields etc. onto the computer. It takes quite a time,because the data is stored on cassette. Sometimes I help him type in the figures.
